org.kepler.util.sql

Class Schema

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.util.sql.Schema

  • public class Schema
extends java.lang.Object
    A generic representation of an SQL schema.
    Author:
    Daniel Crawl

    • Method Detail

      • containsTable

        public boolean containsTable(java.lang.String name)
        Returns true if schema contains a specific table.

      • createTable

        public Table createTable(java.lang.String name)
        Create a new table. If a table already exists with the same name, it is overwritten.

      • getTable

        public Table getTable(java.lang.String name)
        Get an existing table. If table does not exist, returns null.

      • getMajorVersion

        public int getMajorVersion()
        Get the major version.

      • getMinorVersion

        public int getMinorVersion()
        Get the minor version.

      • getVersionString

        public java.lang.String getVersionString()
        Get the version string that includes the major and minor versions.

      • putTable

        public void putTable(java.lang.String name,
                     Table table)
        Add a new or change an existing table.

      • removeTable

        public void removeTable(java.lang.String name)
        Remove a table.

      • setMajorVersion

        public void setMajorVersion(int version)
        Set the major version.

      • setMinorVersion

        public void setMinorVersion(int version)
        Set the minor version.

      • tables

        public java.util.Set<Table> tables()
        Get a list of tables.

      • tableNames

        Get the names of all tables.
